Statements.Statement: (SELECT T.tablename AS "Name", 'T' AS "TypeName" FROM pg_tables T WHERE schemaname = 'public') UNION ALL (SELECT V.viewname AS "Name", 'V' AS "TypeName" FROM pg_views V WHERE schemaname = 'public')

Select a.attname as "Name", t.typname as "DbType", ( Case a.atttypmod When -1 Then (a.attlen*c.relnatts) Else (a.atttypmod-4) End )As "DataLength", ( Case a.attnotnull When 't' Then 0 Else 1 End ) AS "IsNullable", ( Case a.attnum When cs.conkey[1] Then 1 Else 0 End ) As "IsPrimaryKey", 0 As "AutoIncrement", col_description(a.attrelid,a.attnum) as "Description" From pg_class c Left Join pg_attribute a on a.attrelid=c.oid Left Join pg_type t on t.oid=a.atttypid Left Join pg_constraint cs on cs.conrelid=c.oid and cs.contype='p' Where a.attnum>0 and t.typname is not null and c.relname=@TableName
